title: Security breach
content:
I have a couple of problems

1) I just did a security firefox security scan an was informed that in 2017 there was a breach of my "My Heritage Account" and that passwords and Email addresses were compromised. I would like more info on this reportÂ : just what passwords and Email addresses were compromised? Was it just My Heritage data or would it be everything on my computer.


2) My Firefox software won't open my Outlook emails: Edge and Google Chrome work fine. What is the fix for this problem?
